verses.text_plain: Then went Boaz up to the gate, and sat him down there: and, behold, the kinsman of whom Boaz spake came by; unto whom he said, Ho, such a one! turn aside, sit down here. And he turned aside, and sat down.
verses.verse_html: 1Then went Boaz up to the gate, and sat him down there: and, behold, the kinsman of whom Boaz spake came by; unto whom he said, Ho, such a one! turn aside, sit down here. And he turned aside, and sat down.

verses.text_plain: And he took ten men of the elders of the city, and said, Sit ye down here. And they sat down.
verses.verse_html: 2And he took ten men of the elders of the city, and said, Sit ye down here. And they sat down.

verses.text_plain: And he said unto the kinsman, Naomi, that is come again out of the country of Moab, selleth a parcel of land, which was our brother Elimelech’s:
verses.verse_html: 3And he said unto the kinsman, Naomi, that is come again out of the country of Moab, selleth a parcel of land, which was our brother Elimelech’s:

verses.text_plain: And I thought to advertise thee, saying, Buy it before the inhabitants, and before the elders of my people. If thou wilt redeem it, redeem it: but if thou wilt not redeem it, then tell me, that I may know: for there is none to redeem it beside thee; and I am after thee. And he said, I will redeem it.
verses.verse_html:
4And I thought to advertise thee, saying, Buy it before the inhabitants, and before the elders of my people. If thou wilt redeem it, redeem it: but if thou wilt not redeem it, then tell me, that I may know: for there is none to redeem it beside thee; and I am after thee. And he said, I will redeem it. ▼
▼ I thought…: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear

tokens.text: but if thou wilt not redeem

footnotes.body_text: ▼ I thought…: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear
footnotes.body_html: ▼ I thought…: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear

verses.text_plain: Then said Boaz, What day thou buyest the field of the hand of Naomi, thou must buy it also of Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of the dead, to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance.
verses.verse_html: 5Then said Boaz, What day thou buyest the field of the hand of Naomi, thou must buy it also of Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of the dead, to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance.

verses.text_plain: And the kinsman said, I cannot redeem it for myself, lest I mar mine own inheritance: redeem thou my right to thyself; for I cannot redeem it.
verses.verse_html: 6And the kinsman said, I cannot redeem it for myself, lest I mar mine own inheritance: redeem thou my right to thyself; for I cannot redeem it.

verses.text_plain: Now this was the manner in former time in Israel concerning redeeming and concerning changing, for to confirm all things; a man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbour: and this was a testimony in Israel.
verses.verse_html: 7Now this was the manner in former time in Israel concerning redeeming and concerning changing, for to confirm all things; a man plucked off his shoe, and gave it to his neighbour: and this was a testimony in Israel.

verses.text_plain: Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz, Buy it for thee. So he drew off his shoe.
verses.verse_html: 8Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz, Buy it for thee. So he drew off his shoe.

tokens.text: for thee. So he drew off

verses.text_plain: And Boaz said unto the elders, and unto all the people, Ye are witnesses this day, that I have bought all that was Elimelech’s, and all that was Chilion’s and Mahlon’s, of the hand of Naomi.
verses.verse_html: 9And Boaz said unto the elders, and unto all the people, Ye are witnesses this day, that I have bought all that was Elimelech’s, and all that was Chilion’s and Mahlon’s, of the hand of Naomi.

verses.text_plain: Moreover Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of Mahlon, have I purchased to be my wife, to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance, that the name of the dead be not cut off from among his brethren, and from the gate of his place: ye are witnesses this day.
verses.verse_html: 10Moreover Ruth the Moabitess, the wife of Mahlon, have I purchased to be my wife, to raise up the name of the dead upon his inheritance, that the name of the dead be not cut off from among his brethren, and from the gate of his place: ye are witnesses this day.

verses.text_plain: And all the people that were in the gate, and the elders, said, We are witnesses. The Lord make the woman that is come into thine house like Rachel and like Leah, which two did build the house of Israel: and do thou worthily in Ephratah, and be famous in Beth–lehem:
verses.verse_html:
11And all the people that were in the gate, and the elders, said, We are witnesses. The Lord make the woman that is come into thine house like Rachel and like Leah, which two did build the house of Israel: and do thou worthily in Ephratah, and be famous in Beth–lehem: ▼
▼ do thou…: or, get thee riches, or, power
 , ▼
▼ be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name

footnotes.body_text: ▼ do thou…: or, get thee riches, or, power
footnotes.body_html: ▼ do thou…: or, get thee riches, or, power

footnotes.body_text: ▼ be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name
footnotes.body_html: ▼ be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name

verses.text_plain: And let thy house be like the house of Pharez, whom Tamar bare unto Judah, of the seed which the Lord shall give thee of this young woman.
verses.verse_html: 12And let thy house be like the house of Pharez, whom Tamar bare unto Judah, of the seed which the Lord shall give thee of this young woman.

verses.text_plain: So Boaz took Ruth, and she was his wife: and when he went in unto her, the Lord gave her conception, and she bare a son.
verses.verse_html: 13So Boaz took Ruth, and she was his wife: and when he went in unto her, the Lord gave her conception, and she bare a son.

verses.text_plain: And the women said unto Naomi, Blessed be the Lord, which hath not left thee this day without a kinsman, that his name may be famous in Israel.
verses.verse_html:
14And the women said unto Naomi, Blessed be the Lord, which hath not left thee this day without a kinsman, that his name may be famous in Israel. ▼
▼ left…: Heb. caused to cease unto thee
 , ▼
▼ kinsman: or, redeemer

footnotes.body_text: ▼ left…: Heb. caused to cease unto thee
footnotes.body_html: ▼ left…: Heb. caused to cease unto thee

verses.text_plain: And he shall be unto thee a restorer of thy life, and a nourisher of thine old age: for thy daughter in law, which loveth thee, which is better to thee than seven sons, hath born him.
verses.verse_html:
15And he shall be unto thee a restorer of thy life, and a nourisher of thine old age: for thy daughter in law, which loveth thee, which is better to thee than seven sons, hath born him. ▼
▼ a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish
 , ▼
▼ thine…: Heb. thy gray hairs

tokens.text: And he shall be unto thee a restorer

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish
▼ thine…: Heb. thy gray hairs

verses.text_plain: And Naomi took the child, and laid it in her bosom, and became nurse unto it.
verses.verse_html: 16And Naomi took the child, and laid it in her bosom, and became nurse unto it.

verses.text_plain: And the women her neighbours gave it a name, saying, There is a son born to Naomi; and they called his name Obed: he is the father of Jesse, the father of David.
verses.verse_html: 17And the women her neighbours gave it a name, saying, There is a son born to Naomi; and they called his name Obed: he is the father of Jesse, the father of David.

verses.text_plain: Now these are the generations of Pharez: Pharez begat Hezron,
verses.verse_html: 18Now these are the generations of Pharez: Pharez begat Hezron,

verses.text_plain: And Hezron begat Ram, and Ram begat Amminadab,
verses.verse_html: 19And Hezron begat Ram, and Ram begat Amminadab,

verses.text_plain: And Amminadab begat Nahshon, and Nahshon begat Salmon,
verses.verse_html:
20And Amminadab begat Nahshon, and Nahshon begat Salmon, ▼
▼ Salmon: or, Salmah

verses.text_plain: And Salmon begat Boaz, and Boaz begat Obed,
verses.verse_html: 21And Salmon begat Boaz, and Boaz begat Obed,

verses.text_plain: And Obed begat Jesse, and Jesse begat David.
verses.verse_html: 22And Obed begat Jesse, and Jesse begat David.
